programme.desc: Sniper Jacob Broadsky takes out a victim who escaped from the justice system; Booth uses his military training to try to stop Broadsky before he strikes again; Angela's father visits the Jeffersonian.

programme.desc: Brennan and Booth head to the Jersey Shore when decomposed remains are discovered; the team becomes fond of Booth's girlfriend; Angela tries to keep a secret.

programme.desc: When a skull and decomposing hands are found in a dumpster, the team searches for the rest of the victim's remains; Brennan agrees to shoot an episode of a children's show with professor Bunsen, "The Science Dude" Jude (David Alan Grier).

programme.desc: Refugees from the Gamma Quadrant searching for their mythical homeland stop at DS9, then discover that Bajor may be their destination.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine
programme.desc: Quark gets some competition when a slick con artist opens a gambling club on the Promenade; the station suffers strange problems that are normally highly unlikely to occur.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine
programme.desc: A life form retrieved from a Gamma Quadrant planet wreaks havoc on DS9 and seems to have a strange effect on Odo.

programme.desc: At the far tip of South America lies a magical realm that seems frozen in time; known as "the end of the world", this is Patagonia.

programme.desc: Brennan teams up with a forensic podiatrist to match seven pairs of severed feet with bodies; Cam makes college plans for her daughter.

programme.desc: When the remains of a maritime museum security guard are found in the Florida Everglades, Booth asks a former Iraqi soldier for help with the case.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The remains of a successful ad man are found in a new community center playground; the members of the team try to communicate more honestly.

programme.desc: An unidentified 15-year-old girl, who is hearing impaired and not able to communicate, is found covered in blood and wielding a knife; Angela hides the details of her pregnancy.

programme.desc: Booth becomes more determined to catch Jacob Broadsky after he takes out another victim.

programme.desc: Unaware of being used as pawns, Bashir and O'Brien attempt to eliminate a biomechanical weapon used for centuries by two warring societies.

programme.desc: While aboard a runabout shuttle he has stolen from DS9, Chief O'Brien records a log recounting how he returned from a mission to find his wife and friends had inexplicably turned against him.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine
programme.desc: When Sisko and O'Brien beam down to a planet looking for a potential colony site, their technology fails and they are stranded amongst a group of anti-technology zealots.

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: David Attenborough tells the story of one of the most intriguing wild places on Earth, Madagascar; in splendid isolation, Madagascar has evolved its very own quite extraordinary wildlife, more than 80 per cent of it is found nowhere else.

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: The eastern portion of the island is home to ring-tailed lemurs, jeweled geckos and predatory wasps.

programme.desc: A being conducting an experiment traps the Enterprise in a region void of energy and matter.

programme.desc: Data dons a deerstalker to solve a Sherlock Holmes mystery in a holodeck recreation of Victorian London.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: A roguish space captain charms all aboard the Enterprise, but multiple aliens accuse him of theft; Data consults a comic about humor.

programme.desc: A deaf mediator's mission to a warring planet is jeopardized when his chorus of interpreters is killed.

programme.desc: A brilliant, dying scientist who seeks immortality transfers his mind and knowledge into Data.

programme.desc: Pulaski contracts a disease which has rapidly aged and killed a ship's crew and now threatens a research station.

programme.desc: An exchange program makes Riker an officer on a Klingon ship, which later threatens the Enterprise.

programme.desc: When Starfleet orders his disassembly for research purposes, Data is thrust into a legal battle to determine if he is entitled to the rights enjoyed by sentient beings; Cmdr. Riker is ordered to advocate against Data.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Wesley falls for a young planetary ruler whose humanoid form conceals a secret.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Probes from an ancient world destroy the computers of one Starfleet vessel, then turn on the Enterprise.

programme.title: The Lost Boys
programme.desc: Teenage brothers Michael (Jason Patric) and Sam (Corey Haim) move with their mother (Dianne Wiest) to a small town in northern California. While the younger Sam meets a pair of kindred spirits in geeky comic-book nerds Edward (Corey Feldman) and Alan (Jamison Newlander), the angst-ridden Michael soon falls for Star (Jami Gertz) -- who turns out to be in thrall to David (Kiefer Sutherland), leader of a local gang of vampires. Sam and his new friends must save Michael and Star from the undead.

programme.title: Road House
programme.desc: The Double Deuce is the meanest, loudest and rowdiest bar south of the Mason-Dixon Line, and Dalton (Patrick Swayze) has been hired to clean it up. He might not look like much, but the Ph.D.-educated bouncer proves he's more than capable -- busting the heads of troublemakers and turning the roadhouse into a jumping hot-spot. But Dalton's romance with the gorgeous Dr. Clay (Kelly Lynch) puts him on the bad side of cutthroat local big shot Brad Wesley (Ben Gazzara).

Sam and his new friends must save Michael and Star from the undead.

programme.title: Road House
programme.desc: The Double Deuce is the meanest, loudest and rowdiest bar south of the Mason-Dixon Line, and Dalton (Patrick Swayze) has been hired to clean it up. He might not look like much, but the Ph.D.-educated bouncer proves he's more than capable -- busting the heads of troublemakers and turning the roadhouse into a jumping hot-spot. But Dalton's romance with the gorgeous Dr. Clay (Kelly Lynch) puts him on the bad side of cutthroat local big shot Brad Wesley (Ben Gazzara).

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: A metal scrap from an Air Force craft leads the away team to a lavish hotel/casino on an unmapped world.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The crew is caught in a time warp when they find Picard's double on a Federation shuttle that is six hours ahead of the Enterprise.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Riker's estranged father briefs him for command of a ship; a cultural observance troubles Worf; Riker and his father face off in an anbo-jyutsu match, which is considered to be the ultimate evolution of the martial arts.

programme.title: Hidden Habitats
programme.desc: Wolves are released into Yellowstone National Park after a 70-year absence, setting off a series of events within the food chain.

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: David Attenborough investigates the mysterious and unique wildlife of the dry southern lands of Madagascar.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: After Picard refuses to let him join the crew, Q hurls the Enterprise into battle with powerful cyborgs.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Geordi's life is jeopardized when an alien race kidnaps him; Picard is near death with heart complications.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The Enterprise crew attempts to save the entire society of a planet that is facing certain destruction.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: On her way to a conference, Troi's mother boards the Enterprise and flirts with Picard; guest Mick Fleetwood.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Worf's old love, a human-Klingon hybrid, arrives to deal with a shipload of Klingons in cryogenic sleep.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The Ferengi ambush the Enterprise and another vessel during a battle simulation; Data faces his first crisis of confidence when he fails to beat a visiting alien at a game of strategy.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Pulaski probes Riker's memory to save him from an organism in his nervous system.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Wesley's experiment may be at the root of a computer malfunction threatening a scientist's once-in-a-lifetime mission.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Data tries to organize an evacuation of human colonists marked for death by a race of aliens that values the word of legal contracts above all.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Picard and the crew visit an isolated planet that is home to two people who lived through a devastating attack.

programme.title: WarGames
programme.desc: High school student David Lightman (Matthew Broderick) unwittingly hacks into a military supercomputer while searching for new video games. After starting a game of Global Thermonuclear War, Lightman leads the supercomputer to activate the nation's nuclear arsenal in response to his simulated threat as the Soviet Union. Once the clueless hacker comes to his senses, Lightman, with help from his girlfriend (Ally Sheedy), must find a way to alert the authorities to stop the onset of World War III.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: The stars of a 1970s sci-fi show - now scraping a living through re-runs and sci-fi conventions - are beamed aboard an alien spacecraft. Believing the cast's heroic on-screen dramas are historical documents of real-life adventures, the band of aliens turn to the ailing celebrities for help in their quest to overcome the oppressive regime in their solar system.

programme.title: WarGames
programme.desc: High school student David Lightman (Matthew Broderick) unwittingly hacks into a military supercomputer while searching for new video games. After starting a game of Global Thermonuclear War, Lightman leads the supercomputer to activate the nation's nuclear arsenal in response to his simulated threat as the Soviet Union. Once the clueless hacker comes to his senses, Lightman, with help from his girlfriend (Ally Sheedy), must find a way to alert the authorities to stop the onset of World War III.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: A primitive culture worships Picard and prepares to offer Troi as a sacrifice.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Worf takes responsibility for a boy when his mother, the ship's archaeologist, is killed on a mission.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The Enterprise experiences a rapid energy drain that leaves the crew vulnerable to radiation exposure; Geordi consults a hologram of the Enterprise's original designer seeking a solution.

programme.title: Planet Earth: Life
programme.desc: An investigation of marine invertebrates and the way they thrive in the toughest parts of the ocean; divers swim into a shoal of predatory Humboldt squid as the creatures emerge from the depths to hunt in packs.

programme.title: China: Nature's Ancient Kingdom
programme.desc: China's Eastern region is one of the most densely populated on Earth, but people are making space for nature and some of the rarest animals on earth are finding sanctuary in its four new national parks.

programme.title: China: Nature's Ancient Kingdom
programme.desc: In western China, the vast and remote Tibetan Qinghai Plateau is home to animals such as snow leopards and foxes; they have adapted perfectly to survive in the rugged landscape of the national parks.

programme.title: China: Nature's Ancient Kingdom
programme.desc: China's mountainous central region is home to some of the country's most iconic creatures, from pandas to golden snub-nosed monkeys, who are making their home in the safety of its two enchanting national parks.

programme.title: Planet Earth: Life
programme.desc: The secret and ferocious world of the great white shark, sailfish, puffer fish and barracuda.

programme.title: Planet Earth: Life
programme.desc: Birds can fly at high speeds and cover great distances, but also can show murderous tendencies.

programme.title: Planet Earth: Life
programme.desc: The world's most diverse animal group, insects possess fearsome weapons but also show tenderness.

programme.title: Planet Earth: Life
programme.desc: An investigation of marine invertebrates and the way they thrive in the toughest parts of the ocean; divers swim into a shoal of predatory Humboldt squid as the creatures emerge from the depths to hunt in packs.

programme.title: Planet Earth: Life
programme.desc: Time-lapse photography reveals all the drama of the plant world, unable to be seen by the naked eye.

programme.title: Planet Earth: Life
programme.desc: The diversity of animals and plants, and stories of survival in nature; capuchin monkeys use stone hammers; killer whales hunt seals; an elephant herd follows the matriarch.

programme.title: Planet Earth: Life
programme.desc: Reptiles and amphibians live on every continent except Antarctica; frogs hunt bats; Komodo dragons track buffalo; snakes that live and breed in the sea.

programme.title: Planet Earth: Life
programme.desc: Millions of fruit bats migrate from the Congo to Zambia; a sengis escapes death; whale fight.

programme.title: Planet Earth: Life
programme.desc: Explore the battles fought daily between carnivores and their prey around the world.

programme.title: Planet Earth: Life
programme.desc: Primates are intelligent, capable of problem solving, communicating and social interaction.

programme.desc: When the Johnsons' Christmas present for Grover is stolen, Calvin and Dave team up to recover the gift in time for the holiday; a nostalgic Tina tries to get into the Christmas spirit by reviving traditions from when Malcolm and Marty were kids.

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: Dave's patience is tested when Gemma's freeloading sister suddenly shows up with plans for an extended stay; Calvin grows frustrated that Malcolm is still living at home.

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: Tina spends time with the charming new minister she helped select for her church; Calvin suspects the man may be coveting more than just job security; Marty gets a surprise when he finally meets his disruptive, new upstairs neighbor.

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: When Calvin and Dave get shown up by Gemma and Marty at a local bar's trivia night, the pair hatch a plan to redeem themselves; a frustrated Tina decides to take matters into her own hands to finally meet Malcolm's girlfriend, Sofia.

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: Dave puts his professional conflict mediation skills to the test when he offers to help Calvin find out why his employees are quitting.

programme.title: All About the Benjamins
programme.desc: Bounty hunter Bucum Jackson (Ice Cube) teams with the small-time con artist, Reggie Wright (Mike Epps), that he is pursuing, in an attempt to locate a missing stash of diamonds and a lottery ticket worth millions of dollars. Bucum and Reggie find themselves in a race to the finish as they embark on an unlikely partnership that should -- when all is said and done -- prove beneficial to them both.

programme.title: Fist Fight
programme.desc: On the last day before summer vacation, high school teacher Andy Campbell tries his best to keep it together amid senior pranks, a dysfunctional administration and budget cuts that threaten his job. Things go from bad to worse when he crosses Ron Strickland, the school's toughest and most feared teacher. When Strickland gets fired, he challenges Campbell to a fight after school. As news of the showdown spreads like wildfire, poor Andy desperately seeks any way out of his date with certain doom.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: Europe

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: European Open
programme.desc: Thanks to the time difference between the locations, the financial markets in Europe open when most Americans are sleeping. Bloomberg covers the start of the European trading day with this show -- which airs in the early morning hours in the Eastern time zone -- as part of the network's programming block dedicated to covering financial activity overseas. The show, broadcast from London, features discussions of the stories that are expected to impact the European markets that day and, subsequently, other markets around the world.

programme.title: CBC News Live

programme.title: CBC News: At Issue
programme.desc: Peter Mansbridge hosts this half-hour political forum, which features panelists Andrew Coyne, Chantal Hebert and Allan Gregg discussing the hot topics in Canadian politics.

programme.title: The Fifth Estate
programme.desc: To the families of two women slain in Toronto in 1983, the killer seemed like a ghost who vanished without a trace; the remarkable search for a suspect; Mark Kelley hosts.

Un conducteur ivre roulant à contresens provoque un carambolage mortel sur l'autoroute; pendant ce temps, Maddie a ses premières contractions; le coeur gros, Hen et Karen préparent leur fille adoptive, Nia, à être réunie avec sa mère biologique.

programme.title: Nous
programme.desc: Camille suit sa seule piste viable: Val-des-Saules.

programme.title: TVA nouvelles

programme.title: La tour
programme.desc: Gildor passe une belle soirée avec Alex Nevsky, Vanessa Pilon et Cathleen Rouleau.

programme.title: Le bilan
programme.desc: Paul Larocque avec ses invités fait le bilan de la journée; entrevues, analyses, opinions et le billet de Régine Laurent.

programme.title: Heure limite
programme.desc: Rien ne prédisposait l'inspecteur Lee et le détective James Carter à faire équipe un jour. Pourtant, lorsque la fille du consul de Chine aux États-Unis est victime d'un enlèvement, le FBI ordonne aux deux limiers de collaborer. Les relations entre Lee, héros de la police royale de Hong Kong, et Carter, personnage prétentieux et incontrôlable, brebis galeuse de la police de Los Angeles, s'annoncent tendues.

programme.title: Cher John
programme.desc: John Tyree est un ancien délinquant qui travaille maintenant pour l'armée américaine. En visite chez son père en Californie, il rencontre Savannah, une étudiante dévouée et philanthrope dont il tombe follement amoureux avant d'être renvoyé au combat. Malgré la distance qui les sépare, le jeune couple tentera de préserver son amour naissant en s'écrivant régulièrement des lettres décrivant le quotidien.

programme.title: Qu'est-ce qu'on a fait au bon Dieu?
programme.desc: Claude et Marie Verneuil, issus de la grande bourgeoisie catholique provinciale, sont des parents traditionnels. Leur vie bascule lorsque leurs quatre filles épousent des hommes d'origines et de religions diverses.

programme.title: Les feux de l'amour
programme.desc: Victoria et Chelsea s'affrontent; Billy contacte Phyllis; Abby mélange l'utile à l'agréable.

programme.desc: Quinn a un cadeau spécial pour Eric; Sheila rend visite à Taylor et Hayes sans qu'ils ne se doutent de rien; là, Sheila est prise en embuscade et confrontée à une Steffy enragée.

programme.desc: Accusée de négligence criminelle ayant causé la mort, Maya subit son procès; Lapointe et Inès la soutiennent; sous le choc en raison d'un imprévu dans sa vie personnelle, Marie-Anne décide d ́accompagner Boileau dans sa nouvelle cause.

programme.title: La tour
programme.desc: Avec Varda Étienne et Ingrid Falaise, on parle de reprendre le pouvoir sur sa vie.

programme.title: Les moments parfaits
programme.desc: Georges se donne la mission de réconcilier Philippe et Louis avec une marche en forêt; réticents à régler leur conflit, les deux frères doivent s'allier quand leur père manque à l ́appel; Cath et Steph ont un enjeu à régler avec le père de Geneviève.

programme.title: Léo
programme.desc: Léo et Yvon trouvent un petit carnet noir contenant les dernières volontés de Reynald; Mononcle Reynald a planifié ses funérailles à sa manière; à sa demande, tous se réunissent pour découvrir les différentes étapes de la célébration.

programme.title: Le bonheur
programme.desc: Karol-Ann se lance dans la distribution de bonheurware; elle veut associer Mélanie à son affaire; François est approché par une chasseuse de têtes; un collège privé réputé est intéressé par ses services.

programme.title: Heure limite 2
programme.desc: Le temps des vacances est arrivé pour l'agent James Carter, qui rejoint l'inspecteur Lee, son collègue, à Hong Kong, en vue d'y passer quelques jours de détente et de repos bien mérités. Les distractions sont de courte durée: une bombe éclate à l'ambassade américaine, faisant deux victimes. L'enquête est confiée à l'inspecteur Lee, qui en fait bientôt une affaire personnelle.

programme.title: Dragon: le monde caché
programme.desc: Tout semble bien aller sur l'île de Berk puisque Vikings et dragons cohabitent dans la paix et l'harmonie. Maintenant le chef, Harold est de plus en plus attiré par Astrid, tandis que son dragon bien-aimé Kromou rencontre une créature enchanteresse. Lorsque le diabolique Grimmel lance un plan diabolique pour éliminer tous les dragons, Harold doit unir les deux clans pour trouver Caldera -- une terre cachée qui détient la clé de la sauvegarde de Kromou et ses amis volants.

programme.desc: C'est le grand jour; toute l'équipe s'affaire à organiser un lancement des plus mémorables; Guillaume, manipulateur de haut niveau, planifie la soirée au quart de tour pour humilier sa mère devant un grand public.

programme.title: Quépop
programme.desc: Au tournant des années 1990, Céline Dion devient une vedette planétaire; sa carrière anglophone démarre en lion, mais au Québec, Céline est critiquée pour ses ambitions et doit même refuser un trophée à l ́ADISQ.

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: Inspiré d'une désastreuse tentative d'ascension de la plus haute montagne du monde, le film suit deux expéditions distinctes confrontées aux plus violentes tempêtes de neige que l'homme ait connues. Luttant contre l'extrême sévérité des éléments, le courage des grimpeurs est mis à l'épreuve par des obstacles toujours plus difficiles à surmonter alors que leur rêve de toute une vie se transforme en un combat acharné pour leur salut.

programme.title: Amoureux fous
programme.desc: Rosemary Muldoon, une agricultrice têtue, tente de séduire son voisin Anthony Reilly. Le problème, c'est qu'Anthony semble avoir hérité d'une malédiction familiale, et qu'il reste inconscient de sa belle admiratrice. Piqué par le projet de son père de vendre la ferme familiale à son neveu américain, Anthony est poussé à poursuivre ses rêves.

programme.desc: Un luxueux navire de croisière, le Poséidon, est retourné en pleine mer par une gigantesque vague. Piégés à l'intérieur de la carcasse, les survivants doivent tenter de se frayer un chemin jusqu'à la surface avant que le paquebot ne sombre corps et âme.

programme.desc: Stéphan Bureau pilote un plateau de discussions enflammées où toutes les opinions sont permises, avec ces réactions à vif sur des sujets d'actualité de dernière heure.

programme.title: Du talent à revendre
programme.desc: Des artistes talentueux -- chanteurs, danseurs, magiciens, humoriste, ventriloques et plus -- de tout âge et provenant de partout aux États-Unis s'offrent en spectacle pour gagner le vote des juges et des téléspectateurs, ainsi que le grand prix d'un million de dollars. L'animateur de l'émission guide les artistes et donne un aperçu de leurs vies et du parcours qui les a menées à performer.

programme.title: Rapides et dangereux 5
programme.desc: L'ancien policier Brian O'Conner et son ami l'ex-prisonnier Dom Toretto sont maintenant tous deux considérés comme des ennemis de l'État. Après que Brian et Mia ont aidé Dom à s'évader de prison, ils ont traversé assez de frontières et brisé assez de lois pour attirer l'attention des autorités. Maintenant reclus à Rio de Janeiro, ils doivent accomplir un dernier travail pour retrouver enfin leur liberté.

programme.title: Mise à l'épreuve 2
programme.desc: Les deux compères presque ennemis sont de retour pour arrêter des malfaiteurs. Pour leurs nouvelles aventures, les deux policiers ont une mission: arrêter des trafiquants de drogue qui fournissent Atlanta. Mais cela arrive quelques jours seulement avant le mariage de Ben, le coéquipier et beau-frère de James.

programme.title: Salut bonjour week-end
programme.desc: En direct de Québec, plusieurs chroniques pratiques et divertissantes.

programme.title: Trois fois par jour & vous
programme.desc: Marilou propose des idées pour donner un vent de renouveau à la traditionnelle raclette; en plus de concocter un grilled cheese ingénieux aux restes de raclette, elle reçoit Hélène Bourgeois Leclerc et Benoit McGinnis pour cuisiner dans le plaisir.

programme.title: Bien
programme.desc: Bianca Longpré est l'invitée de Saskia; elle la reçoit pour parler de ses plus récents projets; entre autres celui de "Mamans extraordinaires," qu'elle présente avec sa co-animatrice Mélissa Bédard: une nouvelle émission qui fait rayonner les mamans.

programme.title: Papa marteau
programme.desc: C'est le grand jour pour Charlotte et Mathieu; le temps est venu pour le jeune couple de quitter son petit appartement pour emménager dans leur nouvelle maison.

programme.title: Le guide de l'auto
programme.desc: Antoine et Gabriel mettent à l'essai le très attendu Mitsubishi Outlander PHEV 2023; il est question de qualités dynamiques, d'exploiter de charge électrique, de puissance et de trucs pour optimiser le rendement énergétique.

programme.title: TVA Nouvelles
programme.desc: Information régionale, nationale et internationale.

Christine Girard a marqué l'histoire sportive canadienne, mais d'une façon inattendue; première femme canadienne médaillée aux Jeux olympiques en haltérophilie, elle a vu sa médaille de bronze se transformer en or six ans plus tard.

programme.title: En tout cas
programme.desc: Une serveuse au resto en fait baver à Chloé le jour où débarque un critique culinaire; fière d'être la maman de la propriétaire, Danielle s'en mêle, convaincue de mettre le critique dans sa poche; Sophie et Fred essaient de pimenter leur couple.

programme.title: Les aventures de Tom & Jerry
programme.desc: Toujours en train de comploter l'un contre l'autre, Tom et Jerry sont à la hauteur de leurs ébats habituels. Le chat et la souris font des farces, des blagues et partent en escapades tout autour du globe.

programme.title: Belle et Sébastien 3, le dernier chapitre
programme.desc: Deux ans ont passé. Sébastien est à l'aube de l'adolescence et Belle est devenue maman de trois adorables chiots. Pierre et Angelina sont sur le point de se marier et rêvent d'une nouvelle vie, ailleurs. Au grand dam de Sébastien qui refuse de quitter sa montagne. Lorsque Joseph, l'ancien maître de Belle, resurgit bien décidé à récupérer sa chienne, Sébastien se retrouve face à une terrible menace. Plus que jamais, il va devoir tout mettre en oeuvre pour protéger son amie et ses petits.

programme.title: L'incroyable aventure de Bella
programme.desc: Bella se retrouve dans les bras de Lucas, un jeune homme qui lui offre un bon foyer. Lorsque Bella est séparée de Lucas, elle se retrouve bientôt dans un voyage épique de 400 km pour retrouver son maître bien-aimé. En cours de route, le chien perdu touche la vie d'un lion de montagne orphelin, d'un ancien combattant et de quelques amis sympathiques qui la croisent par hasard.

programme.title: TVA Nouvelles
programme.desc: Information régionale, nationale et internationale.

programme.title: Mission Impossible: répercussions
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt et l'équipe du FMI se joignent à August Walker, l'assassin de la CIA, pour éviter une catastrophe d'une ampleur extrême. Le marchand d'armes John Lark et un groupe de terroristes connus prévoient utiliser trois noyaux de plutonium pour une attaque nucléaire simultanée sur le Vatican, Jérusalem et La Mecque. Quand les armes disparaissent, Ethan et son équipe se retrouvent dans une course désespérée contre la montre pour les empêcher de tomber entre de mauvaises mains.

programme.title: SportsCenter With Scott Van Pelt
programme.desc: SVP's up at midnight and bringing his unique perspective on games people play to "SportsCenter" viewers. The hourlong, late-night show is driven by the host's self-deprecating wit and passion for sports, with featured elements, including Van Pelt's nightly "1 Big Thing" commentary and a weekly look back at the moments that drove bettors wild in "Bad Beats." The show also delivers what "SportsCenter" fans are used to -- news and highlights, guests and interviews -- but in a different, fast-paced and insightful way.

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: Get Up
programme.desc: ESPN's morning show features host Mike Greenberg with a rotating and diverse group of analysts opining about and analyzing the latest news from the world of sports. The two-hour, personality-driven show originates from Manhattan's South Street Seaport, a locale that attracts high-profile guests. Greenberg, aka "Greeny," is formerly one-half of ESPN Radio's longtime "Mike & Mike" morning show.

programme.title: First Take
programme.desc: Stephen A. Smith joins host Molly Qerim on this weekday morning sports debate show. Smith provides his expert takes on the day's trending sports topics and under-the-radar news. They're regularly joined by veteran analysts and the top guests in sports and entertainment.

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. programme.title: This Just In
programme.desc: The latest news, opinion and analysis on the day's trending and under-the-radar afternoon headlines; a look ahead at the evening's potential news-making moments.

programme.title: NBA Today
programme.desc: In-depth, comprehensive daily coverage of all aspects of the NBA from expert analysts.

programme.title: NFL Live
programme.desc: Host Laura Rutledge takes the helm of this weekday show featuring the likes of Marcus Spears, Dan Orlovsky, Keyshawn Johnson, Mina Kimes, and Adam Schefter. The "NFL Live" crew entertains fans while offering all the latest news and analysis from across the NFL.

programme.title: Around the Horn
programme.desc: Hosted by Tony Reali in the ESPN studio and joined via satellite by four panelists from across the country, the team debates popular sports stories. Reali acts as moderator, giving points for well-made arguments and deducting points for those who inspire him to hit the "mute" button. At the end of the show, whomever Reali deems the winner has 30 seconds without interruption to voice their final opinions on any topic they want.

programme.title: Pardon the Interruption
programme.desc: The debate is the story in this fast-paced, half-hour series hosted by former Washington Post sportswriters Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon. The pair engage in high-energy discussions, conduct interviews and often argue over topics not even related to sports. Other sports reporters appear as guests and offer opinions on the top stories of the day.

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: NBA Countdown
programme.desc: "NBA Countdown" serves as the primer for game telecasts on the ESPN family of networks. It's highlighted by a lively roundtable discussion and debate of the top storylines around the league. Seats at the table are reserved for folks in ESPN's stable of NBA hosts and analysts, with the latter group imparting wisdom based on their many years of playing experience.

programme.title: NFL Live
programme.desc: Host Laura Rutledge takes the helm of this weekday show featuring the likes of Marcus Spears, Dan Orlovsky, Keyshawn Johnson, Mina Kimes, and Adam Schefter. The "NFL Live" crew entertains fans while offering all the latest news and analysis from across the NFL.

programme.title: DC & RC
programme.desc: Former UFC two-division champion Daniel Cormier and former Super Bowl champion Ryan Clark talk about their shared love of MMA and the rest of the sports world.

programme.title: Around the Horn
programme.desc: Hosted by Tony Reali in the ESPN studio and joined via satellite by four panelists from across the country, the team debates popular sports stories. Reali acts as moderator, giving points for well-made arguments and deducting points for those who inspire him to hit the "mute" button. At the end of the show, whomever Reali deems the winner has 30 seconds without interruption to voice their final opinions on any topic they want.

programme.title: Pardon the Interruption
programme.desc: The debate is the story in this fast-paced, half-hour series hosted by former Washington Post sportswriters Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon. The pair engage in high-energy discussions, conduct interviews and often argue over topics not even related to sports. Other sports reporters appear as guests and offer opinions on the top stories of the day.

programme.title: SportsCenter With Scott Van Pelt
programme.desc: SVP's up at midnight and bringing his unique perspective on games people play to "SportsCenter" viewers. The hourlong, late-night show is driven by the host's self-deprecating wit and passion for sports, with featured elements, including Van Pelt's nightly "1 Big Thing" commentary and a weekly look back at the moments that drove bettors wild in "Bad Beats." The show also delivers what "SportsCenter" fans are used to -- news and highlights, guests and interviews -- but in a different, fast-paced and insightful way.

The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: NASCAR Craftsman Truck Series
programme.desc: The NASCAR Craftsman Truck Series heads to the Circuit of the Americas for the XPEL 225. Christian Eckes earned his first Truck Series win since September 2021 at the Atlanta Motor Speedway on March 18 and moved up to first place in the standings.

programme.title: NASCAR RaceDay - NXS

programme.title: NASCAR Xfinity Racing Series
programme.desc: NASCAR Xfinity Series drivers take to the unique Circuit of the Americas track for the Pit Boss 250. Austin Hill picked up his third win of 2023 in Atlanta on March 18. Hill finished runner-up in his first race at the Circuit of the Americas in 2022.

Apollo 16: Nothing So Hidden
programme.desc: This film shows the landing and the three lunar traverses in the highland region of the moon, near the crater descartes. It includes an astronaut's eye view from the rover, lunar grand prix, discovery of the house-sized rock, lunar lift-off.

programme.title: Apollo 13: Houston, We've Got a Problem
programme.desc: This video contains historical footage of the flight of Apollo-13, the fifth Lunar Mission and the third spacecraft that was to land on the Moon. Apollo-13's launch date was April 11, 1970. On the 13th of April, after docking with the Lunar Module.

programme.title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi
programme.desc: Luke Skywalker's peaceful and solitary existence gets upended when he encounters Rey, a young woman who shows strong signs of the Force. Her desire to learn the ways of the Jedi forces Luke to make a decision that changes their lives forever. Meanwhile, Kylo Ren and General Hux lead the First Order in an all-out assault against Leia and the Resistance for supremacy of the galaxy.

programme.title: Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker
programme.desc: When it's discovered that the evil Emperor Palpatine did not die at the hands of Darth Vader, the rebels must race against the clock to find out his whereabouts. Finn and Poe lead the Resistance to put a stop to the First Order's plans to form a new Empire, while Rey anticipates her inevitable confrontation with Kylo Ren.

programme.title: Knives Out
programme.desc: The circumstances surrounding the death of crime novelist Harlan Thrombey are mysterious, but there's one thing that renowned Detective Benoit Blanc knows for sure -- everyone in the wildly dysfunctional Thrombey family is a suspect. Now, Blanc must sift through a web of lies and red herrings to uncover the truth.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: When a man impersonating Lasalle attempts to free a young woman from jail, the team investigates both the impostor and the prisoner; Pride's daughter pays him a surprise visit.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Racial tensions rise in New Orleans when a white officer shoots a black Navy officer he believed was armed in the middle of a busy street party.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: When a Navy sailor is found dead, the team tracks the suspicious movements of people in his life prior to his death; Hannah comes to terms with her daughter's relationship with her ex's new girlfriend.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: The Cleaners (Kirk B.R. Woller and Darin Cooper) take Wyatt and erase all memory of him; Phoebe's lack of control over her new empathic power makes her start a barroom brawl.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Three evil sisters steal the Charmed Ones' identities and powers; Paige realizes magic will always be a part of her life; Leo tries to find out who put him on the Island of Valhalla.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: When the sisters hold a seance, they contact a vengeful ghost who has been fomenting trouble between families.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: A demon (Desmond Askew) taps into the sisters' secret desires to create an alternate reality; Leo convenes the Elders to strip Chris of his Whitelighter status.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Dean asks Sam to stop hunting until he recovers from the second trial; when a hacker (Felicia Day) stumbles upon a case, Dean teaches her how to be a hunter.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: When Dean and Sam receive an upsetting video message from Kevin, they decide to try and uncover the third trial; Castiel tries to get away from Naomi and the angels.

programme.title: Lucifer
programme.desc: An alternate dimension is visited where Lucifer has never met Chloe but is granted the freedom of choice.

programme.title: Lucifer
programme.desc: After leaving hell, Lucifer Morningstar seeks a more exciting life in Los Angeles; when a murder connects Lucifer to Detective Chloe Decker, he becomes interested in the idea of punishing criminals.

programme.title: The Replacements
programme.desc: It's late in the season; the playoffs are fast approaching; and the Washington Sentinels have just gone on strike. Scrambling for a solution, the Sentinels' owner Edward O'Neil hatches a plan to bring in legendary coach Jimmy McGinty to recruit a team of replacement players in exactly one week. For fans and owners alike, the strike is a disaster. But for Shane Falco and a mismatched crew of outsiders, it is the second chance they've waited their whole lives for.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: When Sebastian is injured while unsuccessfully trying to prevent a kidnapping, NCIS races to find the missing woman and her abductors; the team gets a peek into Agent Carter's personal life.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The team investigates the death of a Naval microbiologist whose hobby as a "myth buster" resulted in his death at the hands of a legendary bayou creature; Agent Khoury conducts an investigation into previous actions of Deputy Director Van Cleef.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: When Sam and Dean reunite with Castiel, they find a film that could be the key to the third trial; Crowley looks into Dean and Sam's past.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Phoebe's boyfriend leaves her after learning she, Paige and Piper are actually witches; Richard tries to free himself of the family's karma.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: The charmed ones get wishful when a genie named Jinny is freed from her bottle by Phoebe, who is then tricked into taking her place.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect
programme.desc: College student Beca (Anna Kendrick) knows she does not want to be part of a clique, but that's exactly where she finds herself after arriving at her new school. Thrust in among mean gals, nice gals and just plain weird gals, Beca finds that the only thing they have in common is how well they sing together. She takes the women of the group out of their comfort zone of traditional arrangements and into a world of amazing harmonic combinations in a fight to the top of college music competitions.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: It's been three years since the Barden Bellas (Anna Kendrick, Rebel Wilson) became the first all-female group to win a national title. All seems well until a botched Lincoln Center performance for the president leads to a scandal that strips them of their performing duties, causing internal tension and strife. With the world championships on the horizon in Copenhagen, Denmark, the women must get their act together for their one and only shot at redemption.

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: Belle (Emma Watson), a bright, beautiful and independent young woman, is taken prisoner by a beast (Dan Stevens) in its castle. Despite her fears, she befriends the castle's enchanted staff and learns to look beyond the beast's hideous exterior, allowing her to recognize the kind heart and soul of the true prince that hides on the inside.

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: Belle (Emma Watson), a bright, beautiful and independent young woman, is taken prisoner by a beast (Dan Stevens) in its castle. Despite her fears, she befriends the castle's enchanted staff and learns to look beyond the beast's hideous exterior, allowing her to recognize the kind heart and soul of the true prince that hides on the inside.

programme.title: Erin Brockovich
programme.desc: Erin Brockovich (Julia Roberts) is a woman in a tight spot. Following a car accident in which Erin is not at fault, Erin pleads with her attorney Ed Masry (Albert Finney) to hire her at his law firm. Erin stumbles upon some medical records placed in real estate files. She convinces Ed to allow her to investigate, where she discovers a cover-up involving contaminated water in a local community which is causing devastating illnesses among its residents.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The team investigates the death of a petty officer whom Pride had mentored; Brody searches for a place to call home.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: When a Navy lieutenant on liberty dies of bubonic plague, NCIS Special Agent Tony DiNozzo helps the New Orleans team as they try to control a potential outbreak and find the source of the infectious disease.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: A darklighter accidentally sends Leo and Piper to another plane of existence, leaving Phoebe and Paige to mourn their deaths; Chris is in danger of vanishing forever.

programme.title: Charmed

programme.title: Charmed

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: When the Charmed Ones are caught on tape using their powers, the Cleaners cover up the situation by framing Darryl as a murderer and sending him to death row.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: With Piper away at magic school and Phoebe without her active powers, overworked Paige conjures Mr. Right (Gabriel Olds) for stress relief but, unknowingly, releases his evil twin, Mr. Wrong.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Gideon (Gildart Jackson) conspires with two demons to make Piper, Phoebe and Paige part of "Witch Wars," a new demonic reality television show where demon contestants compete in a series of contests to hunt down the Charmed ones.

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Scientists, soldiers and adventurers unite to explore a mythical, uncharted island in the Pacific Ocean. Cut off from everything they know, they venture into the domain of the mighty Kong, igniting the ultimate battle between man and nature. As their mission of discovery soon becomes one of survival, they must fight to escape from a primal world where humanity does not belong.

programme.title: The Meg
programme.desc: Previously thought to be extinct, a massive creature attacks a deep-sea submersible, leaving it disabled and trapping the crew at the bottom of the Pacific. With time running out, a visionary oceanographer recruits rescue diver Jonas Taylor to save the crew and the sea itself from an unimaginable threat -- a 75-foot-long prehistoric shark known as the Megalodon.

programme.desc: Pride listens in on a wiretap of Mayor Hamilton; the NCIS team investigates when Navy weapons get stolen in a train heist; featuring musical performances by Sheryl Crow.

programme.desc: When Pride is spotted tracking one of Mayor Hamilton's accomplices on a crowded street, the suspect opens fire, putting innocent lives at risk before disappearing.

programme.title: Mortal Kombat

Training with experienced fighters Liu Kang, Kung Lao and the rogue mercenary Kano, Cole prepares to stand with Earth's greatest champions to take on the enemies from Outworld in a high-stakes battle for the universe.

programme.title: Ready Player One
programme.desc: In 2045, the planet is on the brink of chaos and collapse, but people find salvation in the OASIS, an expansive virtual reality universe created by James Halliday. When Halliday dies, he promises his immense fortune to the first person to discover a digital Easter egg that's hidden somewhere in the OASIS. When young Wade Watts joins the contest, he finds himself becoming an unlikely hero in a reality-bending treasure hunt through a fantastical world of mystery, discovery and danger.

programme.title: Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker
programme.desc: When it's discovered that the evil Emperor Palpatine did not die at the hands of Darth Vader, the rebels must race against the clock to find out his whereabouts. Finn and Poe lead the Resistance to put a stop to the First Order's plans to form a new Empire, while Rey anticipates her inevitable confrontation with Kylo Ren.

programme.title: Knives Out
programme.desc: The circumstances surrounding the death of crime novelist Harlan Thrombey are mysterious, but there's one thing that renowned Detective Benoit Blanc knows for sure -- everyone in the wildly dysfunctional Thrombey family is a suspect. Now, Blanc must sift through a web of lies and red herrings to uncover the truth.
